title: Boiron StressCalm Homeopathic Medicine
description: Shop StressCalm Homeopathic Medicine and read reviews at Walgreens. Pickup & Same Day Delivery available on most store items.
cleaned_text: like to receive this item ? Description - Sedative-free; stay focused and relaxed. - Non-drowsy; non-habit forming. - No known interactions with other medications or supplements. - No artificial colors, flavors, sweeteners, or preservatives. - Recommended for everyone ages 12 and up. - Box contains three sleeves of 20 tablets each (60 tablets total). Boiron StressCalm provides an over-the-counter option to relieve occasional nervousness, irritability, hypersensitivity, and fatigue due to everyday stress.* Its blend of plant-based active ingredients reduce nervous tension, calming both mind and body. As a non-sedative homeopathic medicine, it helps you stay focused and relaxed without affecting alertness, so it can be taken before performing, public speaking, taking a test, or flying. It can also be used up to two weeks for occasional stress from starting a new job, moving into a new house, or planning a wedding. StressCalm is non-habit forming and won't cause drowsiness. Convenient and discreet, the meltaway tablets are easy to take without water at the onset of symptoms and can be taken on an empty stomach. This medicine has no known interactions with other medications or supplements and is made without any artificial colors, flavors, sweeteners, or preservatives. Recommended for everyone ages 12 and up, StressCalm is available in a box of 60 unflavored tablets with three sleeves of 20 tablets each. Also try plant-powered SleepCalm sleep aid. (BoironUSA.com) *Claims based on traditional homeopathic practice, not accepted medical evidence. Not FDA evaluated. Made in France - Adults and children 12 years of age and older: At the onset of symptoms, dissolve 2 tablets under the tongue 3 times a day until symptoms are relieved. - Children under 12 years of age: Ask a doctor Belladonna 6C HPUS - (Relieves digestive symptoms caused by stress), Jequirity 6C HPUS - 0.4 mg (Relieves uneasiness), Viburnum opulus 6C HPUS - 0.4 mg (Relieves nervousness and restless sleep), (Contains less than 10^-14 mg aconitine alkaloids), (Contains less than 10^-14 mg atropine alkaloids) (Relieves nervous fatigue, hypersensitivity to noise), (Contains less than 10^-14 mg chelidonine less FactsServing Size 1 TabletServings Per Container Nutritional Information % Daily Value Warnings - Stop use and ask a doctor if symptoms persist for more than 2 weeks or worsen. - If pregnant or breastfeeding, ask a health professional before use. - Keep out of reach of children. In case of accidental overdose, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away. HAVE QUESTIONS?
